EmailTemplate.name: Independent's Guide.IG Form Nurturing 3
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners is changing the game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Independent professionals want work, and enterprises need expert help. Why can't they find each other?
To answer this question, MBO Partners is partnering with Work Market, an online platform businesses use to find and hire self-employed workers. The result will be the future of how independents find their contracts.
Check out our press release <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-and-work-market-announce-partnership-revolutionize-enterprise-independent-contractor> or email me to learn more. ___________________________________ Marcelle Saab Program Manager MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6006 e: msaab@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
